name: Synergy Recruitment

overview:
Synergy Recruitment is a headhunting firm that specializes in executive and technical recruitment based in Los Angeles with clients nationwide and internationally. The company specializes in headhunting and recruiting candidates with specific backgrounds, specific skills and often times â€“ from specific companies.

Synergy Recruitment was founded in 2005 by James Mai along with a small team of search professionals as a branch of SynCorp, a global consulting firm and partnership. The team began working with external clients and internally through exclusive Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO) contracts. In 2007 Synergy became recognized as a prime contractor to the United States, providing recruitment services to various government agencies as a sole source vendor.

The company eventually was consolidated in 2012 by the management consulting firm (Bristol & Bates LLC) to support internal hiring of the firms investments and also became an operating subsidiary and autonomous entity.

The company is known for it’s aggressive recruitment tactics and direct recruitment approach. The company often works with investors and exectuives of client companies who require unorthodox recruitment strategies such as infiltration or guerilla recruitment to further specific business growth objectives. Despite being a small organization the firm has made a significant impact on several organizations including several high-level build outs of entire sales organizations.

Client engagements have also ranged from growing venture funded start-ups to Fortune 500 organizations.
